The [http://mu.trac.wordpress.org WPMU Trac] was the official bug tracking system for WordPress Multi User until early 2010. It was merged into [http://core.trac.wordpress.org/ WordPress Trac] during the development of WordPress 3.0 with Multi Site capability, but old MU tickets remain in WPMU Trac as references.

Also see: [[Debugging WPMU]]
